app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Live Transcribe
app_description: Live Transcribe is an App to make it Possible to do Live Transcription and Captioning for Deaf and hard of hearing. Live Transcribe is your own Personal Assistant for transcribing live speech and voice to text. Leveraging almost instant Artificial Intelligence technologies Live Transcribe provides quality instant speech to text and dictation readable transcriptions with just a tap of a button. Use Live Transcribe to transcribe or live caption voice to text for classrooms business meetings doctor s appointments shopping events and more. Live Transcribe speech to text app makes transcribing any live communication easy for friends family and organizations to be inclusive accessible and ADA compliant! Built for simplicity and ease of use. Not associated with Google. All The Features are Available Freely on the Live Transcribe until transcription is done for 5 times then the features will require a paid subscription. Simple to Use Transcribe in real time even when offline with high accuracy Scroll back to grab a quote or revisit a point Input audio via built in mic or Bluetooth device Tap once and continuously transcribe from speech to text for as long as you d like without limits requires subscription after 5 times Voice typing made easy Capture Every Word Easily dictate on the mic and convert the voice to text using dictation The speaker can use bluetooth headphones for increased accuracy even in noisy environments Easy to Read Focus on what s being said Add new lines automatically or manually to break up the text Easily Read Text in Both Light and Dark Mode Export Text after dictation Many Uses of Live Transcribe Take meeting notes automatically Share meeting minutes and summary with teammates Record and transcribe interviews lectures podcasts videos webinars keynotes Provide live captioning to deaf hard of hearing ESL people and anyone with accessibility needs To have access to the Live Transcribe Full Access functionality you can choose between a monthly and yearly auto renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
